participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Supportive and nurturing, Emily finds joy in helping others and is passionate about personal growth.
participant_1.background: My favorite people are the ones who support me and encourage me to be the best version of myself. I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions. I run marathons. I hope I can use my martial arts skills to protect myself and others. I have three beautiful dogs and one cat.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, Jake enjoys expressing himself through his work and values connections with others.
participant_2.background: I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working. I build aquariums for a living. I love going to concerts on the weekend. When people do not like my social media posts, it upsets me. I like to cook and eat Italian food on my own.

content.text: Hi! I love dogs! How about you?
I have a dog and I love him! I also like Italian food.
I have three dogs and one cat! I also love Italian food! Do you have any pics of your dog?
Here's a pic of my pup. Here's a pic of my cat.
So cute! Here's a pic of my dogs.
Thanks! I love them. How long have you been building aquariums?
Since I was 15 years old. It's my passion.
That's awesome! I love working with animals. I used to be a vet tech.
Wow! That's amazing! Do you miss it?
Sometimes, but it's not as great as you think. I like teaching.
That makes sense. Do you like teaching online?
It's pretty cool, but I miss in-person interaction. What do you like about building aquariums?
I love creating beautiful aquatic environments for my fish. I also love the challenge of designing and building the aquariums.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're very good at it.
